Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals and the Houston Astros meet Saturday in MLB action from Minute Maid Park.
This will be the third installment in a four-game series.
The Royals will send out Cole Ragans as a starter, who is 10-8 with a 3.28 ERA this year.
The Astros will start Yusei Kikuchi, who is 6-9 with a 4.39 ERA this year.
Nine of the Royals' last 12 night games as underdogs have gone OVER the total runs line.
Three of the Astros' last four night games after playing the previous day have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Royals' last nine games as road underdogs against AL West opponents.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Astros' last five night games against American League opponents.
